name: Mr. Sign Bot: Learn Sign Language!
name_original: Mr. Sign Bot: Learn Sign Language!
description:
Mr. Sign Bot is here to teach you how to use British Sign Language.  You can learn to sign in an entertaining friendly environment from the comfort of your own home or in an education setting.

This game aims to help children who are deaf, hard of hearing or have communication difficulties. 

As beginners, you can learn sign language in a new, fun and engaging way. 

How to Play: Mode 1: Learn

Simply use your mouse to click the word cards to see Mr. Sign Bot perform the sign.

Mode 2: Test

When you feel you have learnt some of the signs you can test your knowledge.

Mr. Sign Bot will perform a sign. Simply click the word card of the answer you think is correct.

Don't worry! If you get it wrong you have three attempts to select the right sign!

A student made project by Sophie Davenport

With most games today being released to suit the language of the player, I feel sign language should be included in this. By creating this game I hope to encourage more game developers to choose to include sign language in their games.
